empty_account.title: No connected account
empty_account.content: Please add a social account by clicking on the button below

empty_preview.title: Preview
empty_preview.content: Compose a post on the left to preview it on each social network.

max_size: The size of image has to be smaller than {max_size}Mb
max_length: The post exceed max character counts on {social_network}.
min_width: The width of image has to be larger than {max_width}px
max_width: The width of image has to be smaller than {max_width}px
min_height: The height of image has to be more than {max_width}}px
max_height: The width of image has to be less than {max_width}px
max_image: This social network only supports up to {max_image} images.
aspect_ratio: The aspect ratio of image has to be between {min_aspect_ratio} and {max_aspect_ratio}
min_aspect_ratio: The aspect ratio of image has to be between {min_aspect_ratio} and {max_aspect_ratio}
max_aspect_ratio: The aspect ratio of image has to be between {min_aspect_ratio} and {max_aspect_ratio}
